A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While the movie has its flaws\, it is definitely a worthy addition to the saga. And I wonder how much of those flaws are the face that I'm seeing the movies from a nearly 40-year old perspective\, versus that of a 7-year old. \n\nSome of the parallels were obviously forced\, however\, I did love the subversion and thus lampshading of some specific Star Wars tropes.
